channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 01/24/2024 # [New Feature] Login: A brand new Sign-In option! In addition to using your Google account, you can now log in directly to SeaMeet using your email address with simple verification. 01/18/2024 # [New Feature] More browser support: SeaMeet Extension is compatible with not only Chrome, but also Edge, Arc, and Brave browsers. This means you can have productive meetings (almost) anywhere now!
